link.title: Grandview Elementary - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Bellevue Independent Schools will be closed for Non-Traditional Instruction Days from March 16 - May 1. Click the NTI/COVID-19 Icon on the homepage for more information.

div.p: We are Bellevue Independent Schools, located in the heart of Bellevue, Kentucky. With inclusiveness, personalization, and individualization at our core, Bellevue Independent School District connects with every student to pursue unique and fulfilling learning opportunities.

img.alt: love unabashedly value everyone dream no ceilings here positive optimistic go now. B
03 inclusive community schools. 19 average student class size. 32 extracurricular opportunities. 99% high school graduation rate.
the 'vue' vision. to partner with every student and family in the relentless pursuit of lasting fulfillment.
the 'vue' mission. to provide students a creative and personalized framework to confidently achieve their highest potential.

Bellevue High School names new Assistant Principal

img.alt: BHS building exterior with school bus

span.p: Current Grandview Principal Mrs. Angie Young serve as Assistant Principal of Bellevue High School following the 2019-2020 school year.
